name: Care Home
author: Bruno Lacerda
David Parker
Nick Hawes
description: This model was part of the multi-objective benchmarking suite for QComp 2023 [0]. We consider a robot in a care home which has to make deliveries and entertain patients. See [1] for more details

parameters.name: Unf
parameters.description: 0: Don't unfold any rewards, 1: Unfold the value rewards, 2: Unfold all rewards

properties.name: social
properties.description: The tradeoff between the minimising time spent, while maximising interaction.

properties.name: performant
properties.description: The maximum probability of finishing the task, while staying in time bounds.

properties.name: efficient_bounded
properties.description: The tradeoff between the maximum probability and interaction, while staying in time bounds.

properties.name: effective
properties.description: The maximum probability of finishing the task, without exceeding time.

properties.name: efficient
properties.description: The tradeoff between maximising the probability of finishing the task and maximising interaction, before the time is exceeded.
